title: Cross-Cultural Competency Development Project Through Remote Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language proficiency and experience with digital collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Emphasis on remote teamwork and linguistic communication skills enhancement in multicultural settings

learning_goals: Learners can execute three or more intercultural communication strategies in collaboration with virtual team members.
Learners can successfully complete language projects jointly with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can derive solutions for resolving intercultural conflicts using digital collaboration tools.

resources: Cloud-based document collaboration tool (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
